title: kAttu edir pArttiDuvEn
sahitya:
kAttu edir pArttiDuvEn kandan vandiDuvAn enru nEttiram pUttiDavE ninru nAn salippinri 


anupallavi

  sUttira dhAri avan shUduk-kAdal valai vIsa Attirap-paTTadanil aghappaTTu viTTadAlE


caraNam    Aru nALil varuvEnaDi AvalODu varuvEnaDi vEru vElai yAvum viTTu viraindODi varuvEnaDi
sEra unnai mIrum Ashai tIravE tIrAdenru nUru murai AnaiyiTTuk-kUrap-pOvanaikkANa
